articles.title: Pine Island Glacier is more vulnerable than thought - and could cause sea levels to rise by 1.6ft - Daily Mail
articles.description: A new study led by the British Antarctic Survey has warned that the Pine Island Ice Shelf could be more vulnerable to complete disintegration than previously thought.
articles.content:

articles.title: Dinosaurs were already in decline when the asteroid hit 66 million years ago, study claims - Daily Mail
articles.description: Researchers from the Chinese Academy of Sciences studied 1,000 fossilised dinosaur eggs and eggshells, and claim the animals were already in decline when the asteroid struck.
articles.content:
They're often portrayed as going out with a 'bang' after an enormous asteroid hit Earth 66 million years ago.
